DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim pilot test efficacy yoga intervention design specifically individual ocular hypertension . The investigator would like find combination breathing , posture meditation may help reduce intraocular pressure short term yoga session , also long-term across 8-week program . Subjects participate yoga intervention session lead Dr. Pamela Jeter week investigator center , ask practice home least twice week use audio CD .
